name: Run Sausage, Run!
description:
Discontinued runner prototype that I've made during my internship at Marker Games at July 2022.

Controls:    
Left/Right Arrow -> Switch LaneUp Arrow/Space -> Jump
 Down Arrow -> Crouch

There are 2 level pools and each pool has 3 different levels. First, 2 of the 3 games in the first pool are randomly selected and added to the queue, and then the three games in the last pool are randomly added to the queue, at runtime.
